links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=0..63
example: n=8, prime-squares not exceeding 256 are: 4,9,25,49,121,169 so a(8)=6.
prog: (PARI) { f="b060967.txt"; default(primelimit, 4294965247); a=n=-1; s=1; forprime (p=2, 4294965247, a++; if (p^2>s, write(f, n++, " ", a); s*=2); if (p^2>s, write(f, n++, " ", a); s*=2); ) } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 15 2009
author: _Labos Elemer_, May 09 2001
extensions: Added term a(0) by _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 15 2009
